title: T201 - 12 individual cards or discounts for groups -SOLD or Sale Pending

posts.post_title: T201 - 12 individual cards or discounts for groups -SOLD or Sale Pending
posts.post_content:
I have the following T201 cards for sale.  Prices include shipping.  Purchase 2 cards, take 10% off listed price.  3 to 5 cards, take 15% off.  6 or more, take 20% off.  Any non-obvious defects are described.  Paypal preferred; checks or money orders ok.  PM or email to reserve.

Lake/Wallace (HOF) - $32 (creases bottom left) - Sale Pending

Clarke/Byrne (HOF) - $36 (wrinkling along left side at fold) - Sale Pending

Moore/Lobert - $15 (left bottom corner missing small slice) - Sale Pending

Titus/Dooin - $20 (small corner crease bottom left) - Sale Pending

Turner/Stovall - $22 (small corner crease bottom left) -  SOLD

Downs/Odwell - $14 (heavier crease with chipping on front) - SOLD

Seymour/Dygert - $13  (tear at left on fold, creasing bottom left...what is it with the bottom left on all these cards?) - SOLD

Killian/Fitzpatrick - $11 (missing something or other) -Sale Pending

Wiltse/Merkle - $13 (heavy creasing) -Sale Pending

Gaspar/Clarke - $12 (residue on back with paper loss) - SOLD

Summers/Jennings - $32 (creasing along bottom) - Sale Pending

Miller/Herzog -  $15 (creasing bottom right and upper right...finally!) - Sale Pending


Brian

I'll take Downs/Odwell and Seymour /Dygert.   Please PM me your PayPal address.

Regards, 

Mike

I'll take Turner/Stovall-Please PM your Paypal Address.
Joe
PM sent on Lobert and Gaspar.
Cards arrived almost instantly and were excellently packaged.  Thanks, Brian!
